Info.Title: Letters from Iwo Jima
Info.Writer: Iris Yamashita (screenplay), Iris Yamashita (story), Paul Haggis (story), Tadamichi Kuribayashi (book), Tsuyoko Yoshido (book)
Info.Actors: Ken Watanabe, Kazunari Ninomiya, IHARA, Ry√¥ Kase
Info.Plot: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.
